name: Facebook Generator
description: Gets posts containing keywords or from specific users from a given time interval.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: stop_on_error
parameters.description: If set to false, Tuktu will not kill the flow on data error.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token to access Facebook's API with.

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: The users (given by their Facebook user id) from which to get everything from their feed, independently from keywords above.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The Graph API fields to request. If not specified, gets all fields known to exist.

parameters.name: update_time
parameters.label: Update frequency
parameters.description: Time in seconds between requests, if applicable.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time interval to collect data for.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Timestamp of start time of time interval to collect data for. Can be left empty. If a start-time is given, everything from that time on will be fetched. If it is omitted the current time is assumed.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Timestamp of end time of time interval to collect data for. Can be left empty. If an end-time is given, everything until that time will be fetched. If it is omitted, no end time is assumed and everything will be fetched perpetually.
